text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Thursday’s episode, Parthiv Shah, director at TRACOM Stock Brokers and Meghana Malkhan, author and trading coach at Malkansview.com shared their views on Aditya Birla Capital, Sintex Industries, Reliance Home Finance and Yes Bank among others.
title: #AskBQ:  Good Idea To Invest In AB Capital, Sintex, Reliance Home Finance, Yes Bank?
